name: Shift to Wevideo Sync App
description: This app synchronizes videos from Shift to Wevideo

SHIFT_USERNAME.description: The user name that you use to log into the Shift app

SHIFT_PASSWORD.description: The password that you use to log into the Shift app

WEVIDEO_API_INSTANCE_ID.description: Your Wevideo instance ID. You can get this directly from Wevideo

WEVIDEO_API_SECRET.description: Your Wevideo API secret. You can get this directly from Wevideo

WEVIDEO_SHARED_SUBFOLDER_NAME.description: We will put all files into this directory in the 'Shared with Everyone' space
